function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The study involves examining the impact of COVID-19 on park use and demographic attributes, which may reveal potential risks of disease transmission in outdoor spaces.","Impact":"Unmitigated disease transmission in park spaces can lead to increased community spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper sanitation measures, promoting social distancing, and encouraging mask-wearing in park spaces can lower the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Mobile applications for monitoring park capacity, contactless payment systems, and public health messaging through digital platforms can help mitigate the risk of disease transmission in park spaces.","People":"Park visitors, local residents, and community members utilizing outdoor spaces are at risk of disease transmission.","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities, and public health agencies can implement the mitigation measures."}]}
